[/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Company Name” _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”|600|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#7dcbb6″ header_font_size=”36px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Humatics

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.16″ module_alignment=”center” height=”0px” custom_margin=”-5px||” custom_padding=”||” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text ul_type=”none” admin_label=”Founders” _builder_version=”4.19.4″ text_text_color=”#425868″ ul_text_color=”#425868″ ul_font_size=”22px” header_font=”|500|||||||” header_text_align=”left” header_text_color=”#38423d” header_font_size=”24″ max_width=”95%” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||10px” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” header_2_text_color=”#38423D” header_2_font_size=”24px” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Founders

  • David Mindell – Co-Founder & CEO
  • Gary Cohen – Co-Founder & President

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.16″ module_alignment=”center” height=”0px” custom_margin=”-5px||” custom_padding=”||” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”4.19.4″ text_text_color=”#425868″ text_font_size=”22px” header_font=”|500|||||||” header_text_align=”left” header_text_color=”#38423d” header_font_size=”24″ max_width=”95%” module_alignment=”center” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” header_2_text_color=”#38423D” header_2_font_size=”24px” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Description

Humatics is pioneering microlocation technology, offering centimeter- and millimeter-scale positioning that is faster, more precise, and more affordable than any existing 3D positioning or location tracking technology on the market. Their Spatial Intelligence Platform has an opportunity to revolutionize how people and machines locate, navigate, and collaborate in the connected world.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.16″ module_alignment=”center” height=”0px” custom_margin=”-5px||” custom_padding=”||” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text admin_label=”Industry” _builder_version=”4.19.4″ text_text_color=”#425868″ text_font_size=”22px” header_font=”|500|||||||” header_text_align=”left” header_text_color=”#38423d” header_font_size=”24″ max_width=”95%” module_alignment=”center” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” header_2_text_color=”#38423D” header_2_font_size=”24px” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Industry

Built Environment – Localization and Positioning

Vintage

IIF 1

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.2.1″ custom_margin=”0px||” custom_padding=”4%|0|4%|0|true|false” global_module=”1905″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_button button_url=”https://blackhornvc.com/portfolio/” button_text=”Back To Complete Portfolio” button_alignment=”center” admin_label=”Back to Portfolio Button” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”24px” button_text_color=”#7dcbb6″ button_border_width=”0px” button_border_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” button_icon=”J||divi||400″ custom_margin=”0px||0px” custom_padding=”0px||0px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

 

[/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” admin_label=”Footer and Social Icons” _builder_version=”3.18.7″ background_color=”#000000″ max_width_tablet=”100%” max_width_phone=”100%” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||-30px|” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_padding=”20px||20px||true|false” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”” border_width_top=”0.3px” border_color_top=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” border_style_top=”none” global_module=”1056″ locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_6,1_6,1_6″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ module_class=”ds-vertical-align” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Based in Denver” _builder_version=”4.19.4″ text_font=”|600|||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” header_6_text_color=”#7dcbb6″ header_6_font_size=”15px” header_6_line_height=”1.6em” custom_margin=”10px||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Privacy Policy  |  GDPR Policy

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_6″ module_class=”ds-vertical-align” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://blackhornvc.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/Twitter-BV-Social-Icon-45-PX.png” url=”https://twitter.com/blackhornvc” url_new_window=”on” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”Twitter” _builder_version=”4.19.4″ max_width=”23%” max_width_tablet=”20%” max_width_phone=”8%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_6″ module_class=”ds-vertical-align” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://blackhornvc.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/YouTube-BV-Social-Icon-45-PX.png” url=”https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCH9wQgFr5goz-lf9nsjE0pw” url_new_window=”on” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”Youtube Icon” _builder_version=”4.16″ max_width=”23%” max_width_tablet=”20%” max_width_phone=”8%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_6″ module_class=”ds-vertical-align” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://blackhornvc.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/LinkedIn-BV-Social-Icon-45-PX.png” url=”https://www.linkedin.com/company/blackhorn-ventures/” url_new_window=”on” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”Linkedin icon” _builder_version=”4.16″ max_width=”23%” max_width_tablet=”20%” max_width_phone=”8%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
